dct_title_s: Cl. Ptolemaei Alexandrini, Geographiae libri octo
dct_description_sm: per Gerardum Mercatorem, illustriß. ducis cliuensis etc. cosmographum.
2nd edition by Mercator of Ptolemy's Geographia; 1st edition published 1578.
Latitudinal and longitudinal lines along margins.
First 2 and last 2 pages blank (included in page description).
Engraved title page, head and tail-pieces throughout.
"Cum gratia & privilegio sac Cæs. Maies fat." on title page.
Introductory text; extensive statistical information; descriptive text on maps and on versos.
Maps show topography, vegetation, waterways, ports, routes (e.g. Map 26).
Illustrations of figures (e.g. Map 10), flora and fauna (e.g. Map 16), ships, sea monsters.
Map titles appear at top, in abbreviated form; in full on versos (as indicated in square brackets below).
dct_rights_sm: Images from the The Renaissance Exploration Collection courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
